img_above_text:
![Wukong Pagoda 80.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/fd/Wukong_Pagoda_80.jpg)
It can also generate electrical power in its front leg, and stomp down to create a ring that extends outward, requiring you to dodge over it or use the Pillar Stance to evade it entirely.
img_below_text:
Other times, it will perform a series of slow stomps, causing multiple electric spots to appear around you. You'll need to sprint away from these spots before a delayed lightning blast can strike the ground where you are.
![Wukong Pagoda 82.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/5/5f/Wukong_Pagoda_82.jpg)
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Pagoda 80.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/fd/Wukong_Pagoda_80.jpg)
It can also generate electrical power in its front leg, and stomp down to create a ring that extends outward, requiring you to dodge over it or use the Pillar Stance to evade it entirely."
        - Following Text: "Other times, it will perform a series of slow stomps, causing multiple electric spots to appear around you. You'll need to sprint away from these spots before a delayed lightning blast can strike the ground where you are.
![Wukong Pagoda 82.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/5/5f/Wukong_Pagoda_82.jpg)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a boss battle scene from *Black Myth: Wukong*, featuring the enemy "Captain Wise-Voice." The dark environment highlights the creature's large, menacing form, with visible electrical effects on the ground, suggesting an attack pattern involving energy rings or lightning blasts. The preceding and following text describes the boss's abilities, including stomps that create electrical hazards requiring evasive maneuvers like dodging or sprinting. The game's interface displays health bars, abilities, and player status.
